item.title: Beogram 4002 DC Platter Motor Restoration
item.description:
A Beogram 4002 DC platter motor, sent from Pennsylvania for repair, showed typical signs of needing lubrication, emitting a high-pitched noise when first turned on. The motor was taken apart to access the bearings for oil treatment. The bearings were placed in oil and a vacuum was applied. The appearance of bubbles showed air being pulled from the bearings, making room for oil to enter. After two days, the bubbles ceased, signaling the completion of the oil infusion process...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-dc-platter-motor-restoration/
